name: cars_detail
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consumer_reports.
Tool description: This API helps to query trusted ratings and reviews for the products, cars and services used every day to create a review site such as : consumerreports.org
API description: Fetches detailed information about a car model for a given year using the Consumer Reports API.

modelyearid.description: The value of modelYearId field returned in .../cars/get-models endpoint
